abstractText: In monitoring the composition of hatchery-origin spawners in the Okanogan River Basin for a given brood year, it is important to monitor the contribution of hatchery-origin spawnersreared in the non-target basin. Relying on data stored in the RMIS database, this method estimates the in-to-basin stray rate of hatchery-origin fish.
title: Calculating the Rate of Okanogan River In-to-Basin Summer/Fall Hatchery-origin Stray Chinook v1.0
